Sorry guys, this isn't an installment of the story. It's a place for guidelines, character descriptions and notes. I will add as the story grows. I'm not expecting contributors to follow these guidelines to the letter, just refer to them and decide if their thread can use the material or not.

A couple major items first:
1- About incest. I neither approve nor condemn incest in real life. It's a fetish for me, but something I have not and probably will never do for real. I don't give a shit what consenting persons of legal age do with each other, even if they are blood relatives. To me, that's their decision, not the state's. I do condemn the sexual abuse of children, regardless of whether the adults involved are their parents or not, or whether the children believe themselves willing participants or not.

I believe the majority of people who enjoy incest fetish erotica would probably not commit incest. The fetish is there just because the fantasy of people doing dirty things with each other is at the core of erotica, and incest is widely regarded as a really dirty thing.

In most threads it is established that, even though Daddy is the widower or their late mother, he is not the biological father of Jenny and Tammy. His wife Candyce was so intensely sexually active with so many partners that she literally had no chance to know who either girl's father was, and Daddy doesn't even believe there is a chance that he is the father, because he was mostly having sex with other women around the right time for her daughters. His love for Tammy and Jenny comes much more from the fact that they so strongly resemble his late wife, whom he loved dearly even though she turned out to be incapable of fidelity once she got a taste of sex.

However, I did not insert this fact to make things 'okay because he's only their stepfather' like the pornos do. I actually hate lame-ass shit like that. It's just I realized that given the character description for Candyce, she couldn't possibly know who the real father was. But the incest fetish is supposed to be a big theme here, so I'm reinforcing by adding cases that don’t have uncertainty.

First, the girls are virtual clones of their mother, bisexual, hawter than Jalapenos and in possession of absolutely no inhibitions, so there is no possibility that they actually keep their hands off each other. We also have Uncle Jay (mother's younger brother) in some threads, who shares his sister's and nieces' total lack of inhibition and does not keep his hands off them, (and is therefore a candidate for biological father, BTW) plus we have Jenny's friend Leah's parents, who prove quite willing to enjoy their daughter in various threads as well. These are all in to keep the incest fetish in, so have fun with it.

2- Birth control. I had intended that Daddy was a responsible guardian in at least one way. It is my personal belief that no responsible parent would allow his daughter to go without birth control beyond her 14th birthday. I base that opinion on the number of my unfortunate friends who had abortions during my high school years. I don't give a damn about your religious prejudices; even if your daughter is a perfect virgin, she could be impregnated during a rape, no matter what certain clueless politicians have said to the contrary. There are many, many documented cases of this, and no scientific evidence whatsoever of a mysterious ability for the female body to prevent pregnancy based on circumstances.

However, One contributor already left Jenny without BC for unprotected sex, perhaps to make a point, and I realized I had not yet clarified that they were both on the pill. I didn't changed her story, but I'm sneaking in the reference anywhere that doesn't undermine the post.

3- Law: Daddy's Girl is set in Charlotte, South Carolina. This is a state with much more rational law than my home state of Texas (which is so stupidly prejudicial that it has a slap in the face to homosexuals embedded in it, plus it places the age of consent at the ridiculous age of 17. Not as bad as the even more ridiculous 18, I do admit.) However, no state has an age lower than 16, so I chose a state with that age and without too many complicating factors tacked on.

So no sex with anyone ages 15 or down. I will allow certain characters with backstory of being sexually active younger than 16, but no actual descriptions please.

Note that Federal law covers photography and video, plus transportation across state lines for immortal porpoises (sorry,that's the punchline to an old joke.) It does not cover narratives like Daddy's Girl and other such erotic literature. However, I think keeping it to a legal age for the location of the story is more in keeping to the spirit of this particular story.

4- Jenny's home is on a cove or tidal estuary in the Charleston suburbs on the seaward side of the city. The property is large enough and the back yard private enough for seriously wild parties. Beyond the back yard is a boat house where Jenny's father keeps a large (probably around 40') cabin cruiser.

The ‘Cast’ posting is now too large for one chapter. It is a only a loosely organized cast of characters. It isn't always consistent and doesn’t have to be. For example, Jenny's school principal is a woman in her thirties in some cases and a man around fifty in others. It’s mostly here so I don’t have to keep checking back through my old chapters to make sure I’m not contradicting myself.

info.description:
Warning: Consentual age-of-consent incest is a common theme in this interactive. It explores many other erotic subjects, but if you are offended by incest, you have been warned.

I’m hoping to see more contributions from other writers here. I’ll be slowing down a lot in my own posting, because I’m working on a new interactive, but I will still be adding on occasion.

Jenny Moore is an attractive eighteen year old high school senior who lives with her father and her busty little sister, sixteen year old Tammy. Ever since her mother died, Jenny has considered herself Daddy's number one girl. Now her sister is competing for his attention, and Jenny's decided it's time to get serious. It's his birthday, and she's going to make sure he understands she'll do anything he wants!

The rest of this is for contributing writers. If you are here just to read the story, skip down to "Click here to enter this story...":
I have a couple chapters that are actual info on the setting and cast. Many characters show up in more than one thread. They don't always have the same last name or the same back story, but they are largely the same people.

General setting notes:
"Daddy's Girl" 

Cast of Characters:
"Cast, Part 1" 
"Cast, Part 2" 

For many of the women in the cast of characters, I include 'reference models', often centerfolds or porn actresses. These are not to be taken literally, just as ideals that I sometimes have used to help visualize the women better.

If you have an idea but don’t think you can write it, email it to me!! I’ll do my best to write it up and add it for you, and I will credit you with your user link in the chapter unless you ask to stay anon. What’s a user link? Here’s mine: Texienne (60)

Always feel free to email me to change a choice, if you would like to do something and you see an unused place where we can stick it. I can be sweet-talked into just about anything. And roses work well too.

I will also edit your submission if you goofed on something and want to fix it!! Just email. I do disappear for a while sometimes, but I’m a regular and will be back.

Da rools:
1) I reserve the right to edit your submission for grammar and spelling. Or, if it is poorly written. I will not delete any chapter unless it breaks one of the other rules.

2) Always give more than one choice at the end of the chapter. If you can’t think of a second option, just put “something else”. No one-sentence chapters unless you are creating a choice tree. Also, if you do create a choice tree, add a real chapter somewhere in it.

3) Do not switch POV to some other character. Do not end the story before chapter 20. Better yet, don't end the story.

4) Have as much graphic sex as you like. Actually, do your best to include graphic sex as gratuitously as you find possible. Email me for help, or to ask me to spice it up after you submit it; Erotica is my speciality.

5) Only the sisters and their father live in the house (at the beginning of the story). Jenny and Tammy have no younger siblings or older full siblings, but they may have non-resident half-siblings/step-siblings from Daddy’s previous marriage. Keep any characters you add consistent with previous chapters!

6) All of the following is okay: Hetero and Lesbian sex, incest, rape, BDSM, torture, cannibalism and snuff, but no killing Jenny before chapter 20. References to male gay sex are okay, but this interactive is for my enjoyment as a bisexual, mostly Lesbian woman.

7) The following will get deleted or edited out: piss, scat, unbirth, survivable vore. A living being who gets eaten is digested and gone forever. The best we can hope for is to be nutritious and tasty.

8) Age of consent in the state where the story occurs is sixteen. No characters less than sixteen years of age shall be involved in anything sexual, lethal or violent.

8a) I make an exception for backstories where the sex is not described. What I mean is, mothers may have children only 13 to 15 years younger than themselves. It does happen in the real world. Just do not recount the details of the conception.

9) Magic and fantasy are okay, but be imaginative. No random unexplained potions. Specific fantasy threads are provided under choice 5 and are allowed to appear anywhere else as long as magic is introduced early in a thread (What I mean is, don’t add magic at chapter 21. Find somewhere else to do it, and intro it by chapter 8 at the latest.)

10) This. Is. Erotica! (make me horny!)
